<a id="VisualShaderNodeUVFunc"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeUVFunc

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Contains functions to modify texture coordinates (``uv``) to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

UV functions are similar to [Vector2](Vector2.md) functions, but the input port of this node uses the shader's UV value by default.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_VisualShaderNodeUVFunc_Function"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **Function**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_VisualShaderNodeUVFunc_Function)

<a id="VisualShaderNodeUVFunc_constant_FUNC_PANNING"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](VisualShaderNodeUVFunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeUVFunc_Function) **FUNC_PANNING** = `0`

Translates ``uv`` by using ``scale`` and ``offset`` values using the following formula: ``uv = uv + offset * scale``. ``uv`` port is connected to ``UV`` built-in by default.<a id="VisualShaderNodeUVFunc_constant_FUNC_SCALING"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](VisualShaderNodeUVFunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeUVFunc_Function) **FUNC_SCALING** = `1`

Scales ``uv`` by using ``scale`` and ``pivot`` values using the following formula: ``uv = (uv - pivot) * scale + pivot``. ``uv`` port is connected to ``UV`` built-in by default.<a id="VisualShaderNodeUVFunc_constant_FUNC_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Function](VisualShaderNodeUVFunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeUVFunc_Function) **FUNC_MAX** = `2`

Represents the size of the [Function](VisualShaderNodeUVFunc.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeUVFunc_Function) enum.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>
